name: Anywhere 2 Go Co., Ltd
description: Operator of a claims management application designed to facilitate the communication and claims between drivers and their insurance businesses. The company's application notifies the insurance company when there is an accident and gets a surveyor's assistance at the site, enabling consumers who drive a car to have an insurance policy.
one_liner: Operator of a claims management application designed to facilitate the communication and claims between drivers and their insurance businesses.
